title: LEAGUE OF LEGENDS NEW CLIENT
body:
Since the patch 6.22 came in it was all good but today when i opened league i saw message for updating new league client?
so i did and now i can even get in to the loading screen all i see is black pure black what i do? HELP!!

replies.body:
This is a rare bug that occurs if something goes wrong during the upgrade. I'd recommend completing the steps below to resolve this.

> * Navigate to the following directory **(C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\system)**
* Open **user.cfg** with notepad
* Change the line that says leagueClientOptIn = yes to **leagueClientOptIn = no**
* Save the changes, then launch League

Let me know if this worked for you.
My screen isn't completly black but just flickering/tearing with black screens. This client is pretty messed up
